dcterms:description: The 2010 i2b2/VA Natural Language Processing Challenges for Clinical Records include a concept extraction task focused on the extraction of medical concepts from patient reports. A total of 394 concept-annotated reports for training, 477 for testing, and 877 unannotated reports were de-identified and released to the participants.
dcterms:title: 2010 i2b2/VA Natural Language Processing Challenges for Clinical Records

dcterms:description: The MIMIC-II corpus is a public-access intensive care unit database that provides multiparameter intelligent monitoring data.
